articles.author: Charisma Madarang
articles.title: Wendy Williams Grateful for Fans’ ‘Love and Kind Words’ After Sharing Dementia Diagnosis - Rolling Stone
articles.description: Wendy Williams thanked fans for their support after news that she was diagnosed with primary progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia
articles.content: Wendy Williams thanked fans for their support following Thursday’s announcement that she had been diagnosed with primary progressive aphasia and frontotemporal dementia, publicly addressing the news … [+1460 chars]
